      Nexustentialism
      Frat Guys: Expectations vs. Reality
      October 28, 2014 by Chidi Agu

      We had to do it.

      1. Hitting on women

      Expectation:

      They imagine they’re always on like Don Juan.

      Reality:

      Everyone: *collective sigh*

      2. Drinking Alcohol

      Expectation:

      via spike.com

      The embodiment of Old School, Animal House, and every Judd Apatow movie ever.

      Reality:

      Everyone is planning an intervention for them next week.

      3. Threesomes

      Expectation:

      via imgur.com

      Threesomes are awesome and they’re awesome for having them.

      Reality:

      via buzzfeed.com

      The disappointment and shame will last longer than they did.

      4. Hazing

      Expectation:

      via primetime.unrealitytv.co.uk

      Part of a grand and historic tradition.

      Reality:

      via kym-cdn.com

      The opposite of Batman.

      5. Fashion

      Expectation:

      via 2st.com.au

      Reality:

      via blogspot.com

      6. Police

      Expectation:

      via Benjamin Pu

      The Gestapo just won’t let them have a good time.

      Reality:

      Rebels without a cause.

      7. Rush Week

      Expectation:

      via cdn3.gurl.com

      We all want to join them.

      Reality:

      via poetryfoundation.org

      By the end of the week, all of their fliers have given Mother Nature a paper cut.

      8. Dancing

      Expectation:

      via gifrific.com

      Moves better than Jagger.

      Reality:

      via giphy.com

      They are better off just not moving.

      TL;DR Version

      Expectation:

      via static.brazencareerist.com

      Reality:

      Print

            March 21 - April 19
            Yerba mate chocolate truffles

            April 20 - May 20
            triple chocolate cake

            May 21 - June 20
            Fireball pumpkin pie

            June 21 - July 22

            July 23 - August 22

          • Virgo
            August 23 - September 22
            Vodka mocha bundt cake
